header.title: Past Conferences
header.description: Explore the legacy of IC-SIT. Our previous conferences have been pivotal in fostering global collaboration and showcasing groundbreaking research in intelligent computing and sustainable technologies.

conferences.title: 1st International Conference on Intelligent Computing and Sustainable Innovations in Technology (IC-SIT 2024)
conferences.description: The inaugural edition of IC-SIT witnessed a gathering of brilliant minds from academia and industry. Key themes included AI, IoT, and Green Computing. The conference featured 4 keynote sessions and over 60 technical paper presentations.
